product_name: The North Face Verto Jacket - Women's
long_description: The women's featherweight Verto Jacket from The North Face protects you when a chilly wind kicks up while you're on belay or setting up a backcountry camp. Ripstop nylon fabric is windproof and has a weather-resistant finish. Zippered chest pocket doubles as a compressible stow pouch with a clip loop for a carabiner (not included). Hood, hem and cuffs are elastic bound to keep weather out, warmth in. Women's Verto Jacket from The North Face weighs an average of just 3.1 oz.
short_description: The women's featherweight Verto Jacket from The North Face protects you when a chilly wind kicks up while you're on belay or setting up a backcountry camp.
